text:
Visited EYS TCM clinic for a sprained ankle injury. Was treated by Dr Lo Man Ping, she was patient and effective. Months of swelling for an old ankle injury went down almost immediately following my acupuncture session. She made the consult feel comfortable and constantly checked in while I had my treatment.

Special mention to receptionist Ms Jenny who was so kind and detailed.

Best clinic I have ever went to, staff truly care about their patients.

I've been visited Zhou Bin Rong physician for awhile and I've seen improvements in my health. I was able to sleep better after taking TCM, works better than all other supplements that I've taken in the past. I love the receptionists too! Everyone's really friendly and helpful
Friendly physician Lo Man Ping and nice staff Tracy Teo.

My second visit to this clinic. The first time was when I brought my mum two weeks ago. She saw Dr Song that day.  Dr Song was able to put my mum at ease and win her trust with her patience and professionalism.  I feel very comfortable in sharing my medical conditions and she will be able to help to resolve my issue.

Front counter staff Ms. Jenny very helpful and caring with her interactions with patients. BTW, The environment is very comfortable also.

Receptionist Jenny is super friendly. She is good at introducing the physician depending on your needs and adept with appointment timings.
Outlet is big and well equipped to handle kids with toys and sticker. Will definely come again
